member.name: CERT_BIOMETRIC_EXT_INFO
member.summary: The CERT_BIOMETRIC_EXT_INFO structure contains a set of biometric information.

member.name: CERT_BIOMETRIC_EXT_INFO.cBiometricData
member.summary: The number of elements in the rgBiometricData array.

member.name: CERT_BIOMETRIC_EXT_INFO.rgBiometricData
member.summary: An array of structures that contain the biometric data. The cBiometricData member contains the number of elements in this array.
